import React from 'react'; import './Donate.css' import {useTranslation} from "react-i18next"; import Form from "../form/Form" const Donate = () => { const [t] = useTranslation('global') const locale = navigator.language.split('-')[1] return (

{t('donate.title')}

{t('donate.subtitle')}

{t('donate.text1')}

{t('donate.text2')}

{t('donate.text3')}

{t('donate.text4')}

) } export default Donate
